attachments.title: Dark Souls 2 conquered with a guitar controller, a Wii Remote is up next
attachments.text: The Dark Souls player who bested From Software's role-playing game using nothing but a Rock Band guitar controller made good on his pledge to strum his way through the second game. Yes, now Dark...
attachments.fallback: Polygon: Dark Souls 2 conquered with a guitar controller, a Wii Remote is up next
